TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IConfigMapPath

summary.span: 提供对配置文件虚拟路径与物理路径之间的映射的访问。

span.span: Provides access to the mapping between configuration-file virtual and physical paths.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

summary.span: 获取与特定站点关联的虚拟目录名称。

The must be unique.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ResolveSiteArgument (string siteArgument, out string siteName, out string siteID);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ResolveSiteArgument(string siteArgument, [out] string& siteName, [out] string& siteID) cil managed
Public Sub ResolveSiteArgument (siteArgument As String, ByRef siteName As String, ByRef siteID As String)
public: void ResolveSiteArgument(System::String ^ siteArgument, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % siteName, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % siteID);

param.name: siteArgument
param.span: 站点名称或站点标识符。

span.span: The site name or site identifier.
The default site name.
A unique identifier for the site.

summary.span: 基于站点参数值填充站点名称和站点 ID。

span.span: Populates the site name and site ID based on a site argument value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`siteArgument`是`null`、 等同于默认站点名称，或等同于默认站点标识符，`siteName`和`siteID`使用默认站点值填充。If `siteArgument` is `null`, is equal to the default site name, or is equal to the default site identifier, the `siteName` and `siteID` are populated with the default site values. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
